name: Loaded Defense
description:
Using Many Software principles of overloading you will see an example of classes deriving and overloading from other classes quite a bit. We also devised a unique UI idea, focusing on clarity, accessibility, and simplicity.

Joseph: Sound Track, Design

Nathan: Gameplay Designer, audio FX and weapons

Taylor: Game Software Architect, Designer, 3D artist

Josh: 3D Art, Designer

Weapon SFX: Cafofo (Unity Asset Store)
